name: Amazon Print Replica eBook
summary: Learn about .AZW4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: In 2011, Amazon began releasing digital textbooks for Kindle saved in the AZW4 format. While this format uses an extension similar to the .AZW and .AZW3 extensions, AZW4 files are different than AZW and AZW3 files. For example, because AZW4 files are comprised of PDF pages, their text does not reflow. Readers can also zoom and pan within AZW4 eBooks.

AZW4 files purchased from Amazon use the same DRM protections as Amazon-provided .MOBI files. To create an AZW4 file, publishers submit a PDF of their book to Amazon. Amazon then packages the PDF in a copy-protected AZW4 file and makes it available in the Kindle Store.

instructions: You can open an AZW4 file in Amazon Kindle (multiplatform). If the file is copy-protected using DRM, you can open it only if you are an authorized user. If your AZW4 file is not copy-protected, you can also open it in Calibre (multiplatform).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
